trans-unit.source: Provides numerous conversion functions and exposes a GDI+ <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Innehåller flera konvertering fungerar och visar GDI + <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: This class provides numerous conversion functions and also exposes a GDI+ <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Den här klassen innehåller många konvertering fungerar och visar även GDI + <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Note that when rendering as Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG), use of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object for custom drawing will not be included as part of the SVG document.
trans-unit.target: Observera att vid återgivningen som grafik SVG (Scalable Vector), användning av den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objekt för anpassade ritning inte inkluderas som en del av SVG-dokumentet.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Note also that, by default, <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> functions usually take absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Observera också att som standard <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>funktioner tar vanligtvis absoluta koordinater.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Therefore the conversion methods of this class should be useful if you perform drawing operations.
trans-unit.target: Metoder för konvertering av den här klassen bör därför användbart om du utför åtgärder.

trans-unit.source: A ChartGraphics object is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs> class?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True, which makes it easy to perform custom drawing in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> events.
trans-unit.target: Ett ChartGraphics objekt visas i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A>egenskapen för den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs>klassen? qualifyHint = False & autoUpgrade = True, vilket gör det enkelt att utföra anpassad ritning i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint>och <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>händelser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If significant changes are made to the default behavior of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, the chart image and its associated elements may be drawn erratically.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Om betydande ändringar görs i standardbeteendet för den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objekt diagrambilden och dess associerade element kan ritas oförutsägbart.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: For example, positioning may be altered.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel får placera ändras.

trans-unit.source: It is highly recommended that you become well acquainted with GDI+ before you make any significant changes to the properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Vi rekommenderar att du också bekanta med GDI + innan du gör några betydande ändringar i egenskaperna för den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objekt.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged and, optionally, managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Versioner ohanterad och du kan också hanteras resurser.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> to release both unmanaged and managed resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>Frisläpp både ohanterade och hanterade resurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> att släppa endast resurser som inte hanteras.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object and converts its relative coordinates to absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Tar en <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> objekt och konverterar de relativa koordinaterna till absoluta koordinater.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> objekt i relativa koordinater.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> objekt i absoluta koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object and converts its relative coordinates to absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Tar en <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> objekt och konverterar de relativa koordinaterna till absoluta koordinater.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> objekt i relativa koordinater.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> objekt i absoluta koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object that uses relative coordinates and returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object that uses absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Tar en <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> objekt som använder relativa koordinater och returnerar ett <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> objekt som använder absoluta koordinater.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> objekt i relativa koordinater.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> objekt i absoluta koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Takes a given axis value for a specified axis and returns the relative pixel value.
trans-unit.target: Tar en viss axelvärde för en angiven axel och returnerar pixelvärdet relativa.

trans-unit.source: Chart area name.
trans-unit.target: Diagramområdesnamn.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisName"></xref> enumeration value that identifies the relevant axis.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisName"> </xref> uppräkningsvärdet som identifierar den relevanta axeln.

trans-unit.source: The axis value to be converted to a relative pixel value.
trans-unit.target: Axelvärde som ska konverteras till ett pixelvärde för relativa.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the converted axis value, in relative pixel coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> värde som representerar den konverterade axelvärde i pixel relativa koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object that uses absolute coordinates and returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object that uses relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Tar en <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> objekt som använder absoluta koordinater och returnerar ett <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> objekt som använder relativa koordinater.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> objekt i absoluta koordinater.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> objekt i relativa koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that is using absolute coordinates and returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object that uses relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Tar en <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> struktur som använder absoluta koordinater och returnerar ett <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> objekt som använder relativa koordinater.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> struktur i absoluta koordinater.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> strukturen i relativa koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates and returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object that uses relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Tar en <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> objekt i absoluta koordinater och returnerar ett <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> objekt som använder relativa koordinater.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> objekt i absoluta koordinater.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> objekt i relativa koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a GDI+ <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object that can be used for drawing purposes.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger GDI + <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objekt som kan användas för att rita syften.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to perform any custom drawing that can be performed using GDI+.
trans-unit.target: Du kan använda den här egenskapen för att utföra en anpassad ritning som kan utföras med hjälp av GDI +.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used for drawing.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objektet som används för att rita.
